short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sort, organize, and manage your tabs efficiently.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
OrganizeNow: Master Your Tabs

Transform your browsing chaos into order with OrganizeNow, the ultimate Chrome extension for tab management. With just a few clicks, you can:

Sort Tabs Alphabetically: Instantly arrange your tabs in alphabetical order, making it easier to find the one you need.
Amplify Focus: Bring tabs with sound to the forefront, so you never miss a beat or lose focus. Now you can easily find tabs that are producing sounds and bring them to the front with a click of a button.
Group with Ease: Automatically organize tabs into neat groups by their content, decluttering your digital space.

Private: We have built this extension with privacy in mind. Everything is processed locally on your device.

Ideal for professionals, students, and anyone looking to streamline their online workflow. Embrace the simplicity and efficiency of OrganizeNow and leave your tab management to us.

We are a small team working to build useful products to make your life easy.

If you would like to request a new feature or have feedback, reach out to us at: tonttu.products@gmail.com
